title: HOW TO SETUP A WORM FARM + WHAT TO FEED WORMS | Vermicomposting | Hey It's A Good Life

tasks.task: Setting up a worm farm or bin
subtasks: Acquiring supplies
Adding cardboard to fortify the bin
Incorporating browns (e.g., leaves, shredded paper)
Adding compost for organic material
Introducing worms and grit (e.g., coffee grinds, eggshells)
Covering worms with soil and compost
Selecting appropriate food (e.g., bananas, apple cores)
Balancing food to prevent overfeeding
Covering food to deter pests and fruit flies
Ensuring proper water consistency (sponge-like)
Using filtered water to avoid chemicals

tasks.task: Setting up a worm farm or bin
subtasks: Acquiring supplies (cardboard, browns, compost, worms, grit, bin)
Adding cardboard layer to prevent escape
Incorporating browns as bedding
Adding compost for organic material
Introducing worms and grit
Covering worms with soil/compost for comfort
Selecting appropriate food (e.g., bananas, apple cores)
Balancing feed to prevent overfeeding
Covering food to deter fruit flies
Ensuring proper water consistency (sponge-like)
Using filtered water to avoid chemicals
